# Pyrefly

## Docs

- [Configuration](configuration): Configure Pyrefly settings and options
- [Error Kinds](error-kinds): Pyrefly error categories and suppression codes
- [Error Suppressions](error-suppressions): How to suppress errors in Pyrefly
- [Getting Started](getting-started): Quick start guide for Pyrefly
- [IDE](IDE): Pyrefly in the IDE
- [Import Resolution](import-resolution): How Pyrefly finds and resolves imports
- [Introduction](index): Guides and references for all you need to know about Pyrefly
- [Installation](installation): How to install Pyrefly
- [Migrating from Mypy](migrating-from-mypy): How to switch from Mypy to Pyrefly
- [Migrating from Pyright](migrating-from-pyright): How to switch from Pyright to Pyrefly
- [Migrating to Pyrefly](migrating-to-pyrefly): How to switch from another type checker to Pyrefly
- [FAQ](pyrefly-faq): Frequently Asked Questions about Pyrefly, a PEP 484 compliant Type Checker for Python and IDE extension.
- [Typing Features and PEPS](python-features-and-peps): Typing Features and PEPS available in each Python Version.
- [Python Typing for New Developers](python-typing-for-beginners): A gentle, exampleâ€‘driven introduction to static type hints in Python.
- [Typing for Python Developers](typing-for-python-developers): Get to know Python's Type System with working examples
